AskCourse_Expert:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>Which course are you thinking? <sp:5:1:0>Beginner
or expert?
IfSelectBeginnerCourse_Expert:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:QuestionNormal>Oh...<sp:5:0:0>you're fine with the beginner course?<sp:0:4:0>Guess I can't argue with brushing up on
the fundamentals. It's good to get back to
your roots sometimes.
Goal_WonderfulTime_Expert_Reward_01:
<sp:3:0:2:0800>Thank you. <sp:5:0:0>I didn't think anybody would
ever show me something to strive for.<sp:0:4:0>You're definitely on my level. <sp:5:0:0>Actually,
you know what? <sp:5:0:0>You're better! You've
reached the peak!
<sp:3:0:2:0701>This shield is meant to celebrate that. <sp:5:0:0>
Use it with pride!
Goal_WonderfulTime_Expert_Reward_02:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>That's it. You've surpassed me. There's
nothing more I can do for you.<sp:0:4:0>Except give you this nice, new shield.
Failed_01_00:
<sp:3:0:2:0b00>Huh?! <sp:5:0:0>Where'd he go? <sp:5:1:0>This could be bad.
We'd better find him, quick!
Goal_WonderfulTime_Expert_Reward_03:
<sp:3:0:2:0c00>The only ones who've recorded a time
this good so far are you, me, and a few
of the Rito.<sp:0:4:0>And they can fly over terrain that would
give us trouble, so personally, I put them
in their own separate category.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0701>But that's neither here nor there. <sp:5:0:0>It's time
to give you your shield.
Goal_WonderfulTime_Expert_Reward_04:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:LaughS>Keep on practicing and I know you'll hit
even greater heights!<sp:0:4:0>But enough of that. <sp:5:0:0>Here's your shield.
Goal_WonderfulTime_Expert_Reward_05:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:LaughS>It is important to always try to beat your
personal best, but that's not a bad time.
You should be proud!<sp:0:4:0>And to prove it, I've got a shield for you.
Goal_WonderfulTime_Expert_Reward_06:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>This shield is for you. Don't stop
practicing now!
IfSelectExpertCourse_Expert1:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>The expert course, huh? <sp:5:1:0>I'm giving out
<clr:0000>commemorative shields <clr:ffff>as a reward for
completing that one.
<sp:3:0:2:0300><snd:Think>Although...<sp:5:0:0>you look like you have all the
shields you can handle.<sp:0:4:0>There's no sense in awarding you a prize
you can't carry, so could you make some
room before we get started?<sp:5:0:0>
Goal_WonderfulTime_Expert_Reward_07:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:LaughS>You're at a place now where you're ripe
for quick advancement. <sp:5:0:0>This shield is a
gift from me, in hopes of future growth!
Lanayru002_TalkInRace_2nd:
<sp:3:0:2:0900>Hey! Don't talk to me when Teach is
watching! <sp:5:1:0>You'll make me look bad.
Goal_WonderfulTime_Expert_Reward_08:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>They're right. The only thing for it is to
practice, practice, practice.<sp:0:4:0>I'm still not impressed with your time, but
you did make it all the way to the goal,
so you can have this shield as a reward.
Goal_WonderfulTime_Expert_Reward_09:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>Maybe it would be a good idea to go back
to the beginner course and brush up on
the basics.<sp:0:4:0>Here, I'll give you this shield so you have
something to practice with.
EntranceTalk_Beginner_Retry:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>If you want an expert's eye on your
technique, just say the word.
ChangeBeginnerToExpert_Expert1:
<sp:3:0:2:0801>If you can go the distance, I'll give you
a <clr:0000>commemorative shield <clr:ffff>based on your
time. So don't hold back!
ChangeBeginnerToExpert_Expert2:
<sp:3:0:2:0701>Well, I've given you all the shields I have.<sp:5:0:0>
Change of planâ€”now, if you get a good
time, I'll give you <clr:0000>rupees<clr:ffff>.
TalkForPay_Beginner:
<sp:3:0:2:0800>I see a fire for shield surfing burning
behind those eyes! <sp:5:0:0>Let's not waste any
time getting you to the starting line.
Exit_01: <sp:3:0:2:0700>Then let's call it there for today.
EntranceTalk_No_Shield:
<sp:3:0:2:0400><snd:QuestionNormal>Can't help but notice that you didn't
bring...you know...<sp:5:1:0>a <clr:0000>shield<clr:ffff>.<sp:0:4:0>Look. <sp:5:1:0>Even the freshest-faced newcomer
to shield surfing knows you won't get
anywhere without your own shield.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0000>I'm not saying "no" to teaching you.<sp:5:0:0> But
you gotta get your own <clr:0000>shield<clr:ffff> first.
Exit_02:
<sp:3:0:2:0701>How about you warm up a bit before you
head out? Sound good? <sp:5:0:0>Then let's get
back to the cabin.
Exit_03:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>There's no need to rush. Your journey on
the slopes is just getting started! Keep
working at it, and you'll get there.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0101>Next time we do this, I'll be wanting to
see how you've improved!
EntranceTalk_Beginner_AfterChallenge:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>Oh! <sp:5:0:0>Is this all some scheme to get me to
critique your form?<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0801>Because I'd be happy to do it anyway
for you.<sp:0:4:0>I do ask for an instruction fee, but you'll
get a reward based on how you do at the
lesson. Plus, you get hands-on practice!
Lanayru001_Failed_Talk_01:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>Before a session with Coach, it's a good
idea to scope out the course you're about
to surf.<sp:0:4:0>Knowin' the ins and outs of the course
so you can surf safe is never a bad call.
Lanayru001_Failed_Talk_02:
<sp:3:0:2:0b00><snd:QuestionNormal>Just where were you headed, dude?
We were all freakin' out that you might've
been in a bad accident.
AskRupee_Expert:
<sp:3:0:2:0701>Do you have the <clr:0000>20 rupees<clr:ffff> for my
instruction fee?<sp:0:4:0>I know you saved my life and all...but
everyone's got to make a living somehow.
You understand.
Lanayru002_TalkInRace:
<sp:3:0:2:0b00>Huh? <sp:5:1:0>What're you doing?! <sp:5:1:0>There's no
time to chat on a run down the slopes!
Talk0001:
<sp:3:0:2:0c00><snd:Think_01>Let's see... <sp:5:1:0>What other advice can I
give you?<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0701>You know where Russ stands during
a run? <sp:5:0:0>That spot a little ways down the
slope from here?<sp:0:4:0>If you hang a left there and go a ways off
course, then down into the ravine, you'll
come to the <clr:0000>cave where I ran into trouble<clr:ffff>.
<sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:LaughS_00>All my instincts as a veteran shield surfer
tell me that if you could somehow pass
through that <clr:0000>cave<clr:ffff>, then surely...
AskRetry_Expert:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>So what do you say? <sp:5:0:0>I wouldn't mind
watching you surf again to give you a
few pointers.
Talk0002:
<sp:3:0:2:0b01><snd:SurpriseS_00>Actually, no. Forget I said that.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0001>A good teacher wouldn't lead her devoted
students anywhere that she herself ended
up stuck.
<sp:3:0:2:0100><snd:TalkPositive_00>That aside! <sp:5:1:0>I have a commemorative
shield for you. <sp:5:0:0>Use this to practice the
normal wayâ€”no risky cave shortcuts!
EntranceTalk_Beginner_1st:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Think>Not to sound greedy though, but I still
charge an instruction fee for lessons.<sp:0:4:0>But you get the benefit of hands-on
practice under my expert eye, plus a
possible reward based on how you do!
AboutCourse_Beginner_01: <sp:3:0:2:0701>It's hard to see in all this snow, but...
ChangeBeginnerToExpert_Expert:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>Let's hurry up and get you surfing, then.
Don't psych yourself out just because it's
the expert course, OK?
Stop_00:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:QuestionNormal>Oh? <sp:5:0:0>What's up? <sp:5:1:0>The clock's still running,
you know.
AboutCourse_Beginner_02: <sp:3:0:2:0701>It's hard to see this late at night, but...
Lanayru001_Goal_HardTalk_01:
<sp:3:0:2:0b00>Incredible! <sp:5:0:0>That time is gonna go down in
shield-surfing history!
Talk0004:
<sp:3:0:2:0c00><snd:Think_01>You mean like surfing on something other
than a shield?! <sp:5:1:0>But what in the world surfs
better than that?
Stop_01:
<sp:3:0:2:0b00>Quit? <sp:5:0:0>In the middle of a session?<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0000>Well, if you want, but you won't get the
<clr:0000>20 rupees<clr:ffff> from your instruction fee back.<sp:5:0:0>
So are you sure about quitting?
Lanayru001_Goal_HardTalk_02:
<sp:3:0:2:0400><snd:SurpriseS>I can't believe you beat Coach's record!<sp:5:1:0>
No, really. <sp:5:0:0>My whole worldview is shaken.
Talk0005:
<sp:3:0:2:0c00><snd:Think_01>Hey, man, shield surfing is all about new
ideas. <sp:5:1:0>How about a craft that could both
surf down mountains and soar over 'em?
Stop_02:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>Fair enough. <sp:5:0:0>We can always do this again
some other time.
Lanayru001_Goal_HardTalk_03:
<sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:TalkPositive>You hit another skill plateau, I see. <sp:5:0:0>You're
getting to be good enough that I should
be the one asking for tips from you!
Talk0006:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Think_01>Whatever these two knuckleheads say,<sp:5:0:0>
assembling a contraption to use during a
race sounds like a good way to lose time.<sp:0:4:0>I don't see the benefit to any other kind
of conveyance unless you could <clr:0000>put one
together in an instant<clr:ffff>.
Stop_03:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>All right. <sp:5:1:0>Now get back out there
and shred!
AskRupee_Beginner:
<sp:3:0:2:0701>The instruction fee is <clr:0000>20 rupees<clr:ffff>. <sp:5:0:0>Still
interested in some pointers?
Lanayru001_Goal_HardTalk_04:
<sp:3:0:2:0b00>I don't believe it. <sp:5:0:0>You're faster than
us now!
Talk0007:
<sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:LaughS_00>But who knows? If you think you have a
good idea, try it! That's how the sport of
shield surfing advances!<sp:0:4:0>I've already given you your prize shield,<sp:5:0:0>
so you get something else instead.
EntranceTalk_Expert_Default:
The more you polish your shield-surfing
technique, the more fun you'll have.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0000>Want me to watch you again and give you
a few pointers?
Lanayru001_Goal_HardTalk_05:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>That's close to our times! <sp:5:0:0>Looks like our
rivalry is about to heat up.
AskRetry_Beginner:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>So, now you've heard our feedback,
what's your play? <sp:5:1:0>You up for another
run down the slopes?<sp:0:4:0>I could watch you again for another
<clr:0000>20 rupees<clr:ffff>.
EntranceTalk_Expert_Greet00:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Greeting_01>Oh, hey there! <sp:5:0:0>Having a good time out
on the slopes?
AskPurpose_Expert:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>Since you came all this way, <sp:5:0:0>how about
a shield-surfing lesson?
Lanayru001_Goal_HardTalk_06:
<sp:3:0:2:0c00><snd:TalkPositive>Not great, but not bad, I guess. <sp:5:1:0>There's
a few more hitches to work out in your
technique, but you'll get there.
Goal_00: <sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:CallFar>Aaand stop! <sp:5:0:0>That's it!<sp:0:4:0>I'll come get you. <sp:5:1:0>Just sit tight.
EntranceTalk_Expert_Greet01:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Greeting_01>Ooh, you're at it early! <sp:5:0:0>There really is
something special about the powder
first thing in the morning, huh?
Lanayru001_Goal_HardTalk_07:
<sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:TalkPositive>Keep practicing and you should post some
killer times!
Failed_01_02_01:
<sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:Ease>I'm really glad we found you. <sp:5:0:0>I'd be a
wreck if something bad happened to the
guy who saved my life!
EntranceTalk_Expert_Greet02:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Greeting_01>Hey, it takes dedication to show up this
late at night. <sp:5:0:0>You're welcome anytime!
Lanayru001_Goal_HardTalk_08:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>I know we're all trying to go fast, but
there's no need to rush it. <sp:5:0:0>Keep practicing
and your time will improve on its own.
EntranceTalk_Expert_Greet03:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Greeting_01>Way to stick it out and show up even in
this nasty weather! <sp:5:0:0>I respect your passion
for shield surfing.
Lanayru001_Goal_HardTalk_09:
<sp:3:0:2:0c00>You did so good at the beginner course.
I'm sure you can do better than that on
this one.
GoalBeginnerCourse_GoodTime_Expert1:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>This is about what I expected from you.<sp:5:0:0>
Nice going! <sp:5:0:0>Here's your reward for
reaching the goal.
AskPurpose_Beginner:
<sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:Greeting_01>Oh, hey there!<sp:0:4:0>You did save my life back there, so who
am I to say no if you want a few lessons
in shield surfing?
Goal_BadTime_Expert_rupi_01:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Notice_00>Oh, that's a problem. <sp:5:0:0>I've already given
you this shield.<sp:0:4:0>It might not be what you were hoping for,
but...<sp:5:0:0>how about a <clr:0000>cash prize<clr:ffff> instead?
Pouch_Check00:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:LaughS>I can see that your pouch looks lighter
than the last time we talked. <sp:5:1:0>And so,
as promised, here's that shield!
Pouch_Check01:
<sp:3:0:2:0c00>Hmm... <sp:5:0:0>I want to give you a shield based
on your time in the expert course.
Lanayru001_TalkInRace:
<sp:3:0:2:0b00>Whoa! Hey! <sp:5:1:0>Don't waste face time with
Coach talking to me! <sp:5:1:0>Move it and head
for the finish line!
Pouch_Check02:
<sp:3:0:2:0701>But it's clear you don't have room.<sp:5:0:0>
Where would you even put another
shield if I gave it to you?<sp:0:4:0>Think you could take care of that for me?<sp:5:0:0>
I wouldn't feel right signing you up for
a session otherwise.
Pouch_Check03:
<sp:3:0:2:0701>All right, everyone, back to the cabin
before we all freeze solid!
ChangeExpertToBeginner_Expert:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>Remember, don't let your guard down
just because it's the beginner course.<sp:0:4:0>It'll be clear to me as I watch whether you
still remember the fundamentals.
Lanayru002_Goal_HardTalk_01:
<sp:3:0:2:0400><snd:SurpriseS>I'd never have believed if it I didn't see it
for myself! <sp:5:0:0>A run like that is practically
a miracle!
Lanayru002_Near02: <snd:CallFar_00>Go for it! Just a little more!
HintNextStep_Beginner:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>It's a simple course with a straight path.<sp:5:0:0>
But don't let that fool you into thinking
this'll be a bunny slope.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0701>This course is littered with a few obstacles
that fell from the sky, <sp:5:0:0>so watch out.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0501>Most people would surf around them. But
some can find ways to put them to good
use. Which category are you?<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0701>If you can clear the beginner course in
under <clr:0000><sp:2:2:4c:460053006800690065006c006400530075007200660069006e0067005f0043006f00750072007300650041005f005400680072006500730068006f006c006400540069006d006500ffff00cd> seconds<clr:ffff>, <sp:5:0:0>I'll let you move
a step up!
Lanayru002_Failed_Talk_01:
<sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:TalkPositive>If you get a feel for the course in advance,
then you can stay calm and focused when
you're on the shield.
Lanayru002_Goal_HardTalk_02:
<sp:3:0:2:0800>What a mind-blowing time! <sp:5:0:0>I've gotta
respect the hustle that went into a run
like that.
Pouch_Check04:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>Be sure to take care of your shield
situation before you come back!
Lanayru002_Failed_Talk_02:
<sp:3:0:2:0300><snd:Think>I was way worried about you, maaan.<sp:5:0:0>
I'm glad you're OK, but maybe you should
take a little breather from shield surfin'.
CautionBigDoor_Expert:
<sp:3:0:2:0000><snd:Sad_01>That said... <sp:5:0:0>While I know I don't really
have a leg to stand on, after getting stuck
in a cave while surfing...
<sp:3:0:2:0701>Don't get yourself in trouble pushing too
hard looking for a new route! <sp:5:1:0>That's my
number one rule.
Lanayru002_Goal_HardTalk_03:
<sp:3:0:2:0100><snd:LaughS_01>How about that? <sp:5:0:0>You sure schooled us!<sp:5:0:0>
We better step up our game, huh?
Pouch_Check05:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>Now that that's taken care of, how would
you feel about another session?
Lanayru002_Goal_HardTalk_04:
<sp:3:0:2:0b00><snd:SurpriseS>Whoa! Are you kidding me? <sp:5:0:0>With a time
like that, you're right on the edge of
going pro!
Failed_02:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>Let's call it there for now. <sp:5:0:0>Wouldn't want
to run you into the ground.
Lanayru002_Goal_HardTalk_05:
<sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:TalkPositive>It's a good time, but I bet you're not
satisfied with it. <sp:5:0:0>Why settle, right? Let's
both keep pushing our limits!
Lanayru002_Goal_HardTalk_06:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>The good and the bad news is, you've still
got lots of room for improvement.
Lanayru002_Goal_HardTalk_07:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>Yeah. <sp:5:0:0>You know, <sp:5:0:0>you could say that your
surfing is starting to...<sp:5:0:0>ramp up.
AskPurpose_Expert_Again:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>Your hunger for shield surfing is written
all over your face. <sp:5:0:0>You want me to watch
you so I can give you some pointers?
Lanayru002_Goal_HardTalk_08:
<sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:TalkPositive>It takes experience to get good, no matter
what you're doing. That tip applies to
more than just shield surfing!
Lanayru002_Goal_HardTalk_09:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>Do the work to develop your surfing style,
and better times will follow naturally!
ExplainExpertCourseToBeginner_Expert_01_:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Chat_01>It's not easy to see in this snow, but...<sp:0:4:0>Do you remember the <clr:0000>big bridge <clr:ffff>that
served as the beginner-course goal?<sp:0:4:0>Surf underneath it and continue
straight ahead.
suremi_fire_shield1:
<sp:3:0:2:0900><snd:SurpriseL>H-<sp:5:0:0>hey! <sp:5:0:0>What are you doing?! <sp:5:0:0>You don't
mess with another surfer's shield.
Lanayru001_Goal_EasyTalk_01:
<sp:3:0:2:0c00><snd:TalkPositive>A lot of people tend to look at their feet
while they're still gettin' the hang of it.<sp:0:4:0>But you'll do way better keepin' an eye on
the course in front of you than the powder
under you!
ExplainExpertCourseToBeginner_Expert_01_:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Chat_01>It's not easy to see at night, but...<sp:0:4:0>Do you remember the <clr:0000>big bridge <clr:ffff>that
served as the beginner-course goal?<sp:0:4:0>Surf underneath it and continue
straight ahead.
Lanayru001_Goal_EasyTalk_02:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Think>Yeah, Coach is right. <sp:5:1:0>But you'll be tearin'
up the expert course before long, if you
if you put some more work in!
Lanayru001_Goal_EasyTalk_03:
<sp:3:0:2:0800>You did it! <sp:5:0:0>Welcome to the world of the
expert shield surfers. <sp:5:1:0>You've proven you
can hang with the best!
Goal_BadTime_Expert_rupi:
<sp:3:0:2:0c00><snd:QuestionNormal>What theâ€”<sp:5:0:0> Did you pick up another shield
along the way?<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0701>I thought I remembered you having space
in your pouch before the run, but now it
seems like you don't.<sp:0:4:0>I wouldn't feel great about taking your
money again for another lesson until you
get your shield for this one.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0000>Why don't you talk to me again once
you've figured out your shield situation
so you can accept the reward?
Lanayru001_TalkInRace_2nd:
<sp:3:0:2:0900>C'mon! <sp:5:1:0>Don't waste your time on me.
Get to the goal!
Lanayru001_Goal_EasyTalk_04:
<sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:TalkPositive>If you're good enough to hang on the
expert course, a time like this on the
beginner trail should be a snap.
RefusePay_00:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:QuestionNormal>Oh, really? <sp:5:1:0>Don't feel like you need to
hold back on my account.<sp:0:4:0>Well, you're the boss. <sp:5:1:0>If you ever feel
like the time is right for a lesson, I'm
always here.
EntranceExplain_Beginner:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:LaughS>Why don't we start with you showing me
where your skill level's at so I can get a
read on your technique?<sp:0:4:0>I'll put you on the <clr:0000>beginner course<clr:ffff>
for now.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0701>I know, I know...<sp:5:0:0>but you have to crawl
before you can surf!
Lanayru001_Goal_EasyTalk_05:
<sp:3:0:2:0c00><snd:QuestionNormal>Ooof, buddy. <sp:5:0:0>That time isn't like you. Was
the snow packed too tight or somethin'?
GoalBeginnerCourse_BadTime_Expert1:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>I detected some slacking on that run.<sp:0:4:0>You still get a reward for reaching the
goal, but try to do better next time!
AskRupee_Beginner_1st:
<sp:3:0:2:0000>My fee is <clr:0000>20 rupees<clr:ffff>. Do you want to get
started right away?
Course_Check_01:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>As you probably remember, the beginner
course is a simple, straight path.<sp:0:4:0>So? <sp:5:0:0>Do you want to check the route
before you surf, to be on the safe side?
Course_Check_02:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>It's a simple course that goes in a straight
line, but that doesn't mean it'll be easy.
Failed_00_00:
<sp:3:0:2:0b00>Whoa there! What kind of performance
was that?!<sp:0:4:0>It was so slow that I'm not going to bother
recording the time. <sp:5:0:0>Wait right there while
I come get you.
Course_Check_03:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>Some bad stuff can happen to you if you
lose your way on the long expert course.<sp:0:4:0>Do you want to review the goal position,
just to be sure?
Failed_00_01:
<sp:3:0:2:0c00>That was weird. I really thought you were
capable of better.<sp:0:4:0>Based on what I saw, you should be able
to cut that time by half, easy.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0700>Well, whatever! <sp:5:0:0>There's always next time.<sp:5:1:0>
I sure hope I wasn't wrong about your
potential though.
NotHadEnoughRupee:
<sp:3:0:2:0300><snd:Sad>Hmm. <sp:5:0:0>I don't think this is quite what I
asked for. <sp:5:1:0>Could you come back when
you have the <clr:0000>20 rupees<clr:ffff> for my fee?
It's a small price to pay for hands-on
training with a pro. <sp:5:0:0>You won't regret it!
IfSelectExpertCourse_Expert:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:LaughS>The expert course, huh? <sp:5:1:0>Heh, all right.<sp:5:0:0>
You seem like you're ready.<sp:0:4:0>This is as good a chance as any to get a
look at how your form's coming along.
ExplainExpertCourseToBeginner_Expert_00:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>The expert course is a lot longer than the
beginner course. Be sure you know your
way to the goal.
AboutGame_00:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>It's a simple sport. <sp:5:1:0>We compete to see
how fast you can surf to the finish line.<sp:5:0:0><sp:0:4:0>We don't race each other so much as we
race against the clock.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0701>And just to check, you know how to shield
surf already, yeah?<sp:0:4:0>There's nothing to it. <sp:5:1:0>Make sure you have
your shield out, then jump onto it.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0100><snd:TalkPositive>After that, it's cool if you get off the
shield sometimes, and it's totally legal
to accelerate and catch some air.<sp:0:4:0>The way you reach the finish line doesn't
matter much, as long as you get there.
It's a pretty flexible sport that way.
ExplainExpertCourseToBeginner_Expert_01:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Chat_01>First...<sp:5:0:0>do you remember the <clr:0000>big bridge<clr:ffff><sp:5:0:0>
that served as the beginner-course goal?<sp:0:4:0>Surf underneath it and continue
straight ahead.
AboutCourse_Beginner:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Chat_01>If you surf down this slope, you'll come
to a <clr:0000>big bridge<clr:ffff>. Pass underneath it, and
you'll reach the goal!<sp:0:4:0>I posted my other two students along the
course. If you head toward them, they'll
help steer you on the right path.
Lanayru002_Goal_EasyTalk_01:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>Can I say something? <sp:5:1:0>From the starting
line, it all looks smooth and easy.<sp:0:4:0>But once you get going, it's bumpier than
you might expect. Those are the parts you
wanna avoid while surfing.
ExplainExpertCourseToBeginner_Expert_02:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:LaughS>After a while, the path will come to an
end. <sp:5:0:0>That's when you've got to smoothly
transition down the <clr:0000>curve to the left<clr:ffff>!<sp:0:4:0>Once that's taken care of, it's back to
going straight ahead.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0700>My two students are standing along the
course to mark the way. Use them as
markers and you shouldn't get lost.<sp:0:4:0>Still, it's a looong course. I say take
whatever route you want as long as you
reach the goal.<sp:0:4:0>The rules are loose enough so you can
get some air or surf on something besides
a shield. Your time's what really matters.
Lanayru002_Goal_EasyTalk_02:
<sp:3:0:2:0c00>Huh. <sp:5:0:0>Freaky. <sp:5:1:0>I was sure you had more
impressive stuff than that.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0801>But don't let it get you down, maaan!<sp:0:4:0>Nobody's that good when they first start
out, including me 'n' Russ!
LetsStart_02:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>Here we are. The starting line.<sp:0:4:0>How do you want to do this? <sp:5:0:0>Want a
refresher on how it works before you
get surfing?
Lanayru002_Goal_EasyTalk_03:
<sp:3:0:2:0100><snd:Happy>That was a killer run! Whoooa...does this
make you our rival?
LetsStart_03:
<sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:LaughS>Haha. <sp:5:0:0>If you're itching to hit the slopes
already, just say so.<sp:0:4:0>Though I guess anyone willing to pay me
for a lesson already knows the basics of
the sport.
Lanayru002_Goal_EasyTalk_04:
<sp:3:0:2:0800>Now that you've gotten a practice run in,
it's time to hit the expert slopes!
Lanayru002_Goal_EasyTalk_05:
<sp:3:0:2:0800>Everyone beefs it now and then. <sp:5:0:0>You gotta
shake it off and make the next one count!
